org.microtitan.diffusive.cache

Interface Cache<K,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - The key to the cache entry
    E - Cache entry object
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ResultsCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FifoCache, FifoResultsCache

    public interface Cache<K,E>
    Interface defining cache for holding execution results. Implementations are not intended to manage the cached items. Rather the user of the cache should supply the cache entry objects and should hide the details from the cache.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E add(K key, E cacheEntry)
      Adds a result to the resultsCache cache.
      E get(K key)
      Returns the result from the #resultsCache by generating the cache key from the specified signature and request ID
      java.util.Set<K> getKeys() 
      boolean isCached(K key)
      Returns true if the specified key is contained in the results cache; false otherwise
      void remove(K key)
      Removes the entry with the specified key from the cache

    • Method Detail

      • add

        E add(K key,
    E cacheEntry)
        Adds a result to the resultsCache cache. If the addition of this result causes the number of cached items to increase beyond the maximum allowable items, then the item that was first added is removed.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the cache
        cacheEntry - The entry associated with the cache key
        Returns:
        the entry that was previously stored in the cache with this key

      • get

        E get(K key)
        Returns the result from the #resultsCache by generating the cache key from the specified signature and request ID
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the cache
        Returns:
        the result from the #resultsCache associated with the specified signature and request ID

      • isCached

        boolean isCached(K key)
        Returns true if the specified key is contained in the results cache; false otherwise
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the cache
        Returns:
        true if the specified key is contained in the results cache; false otherwise

      • remove

        void remove(K key)
        Removes the entry with the specified key from the cache
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the cache

      • getKeys

        java.util.Set<K> getKeys()
        Returns:
        the set of keys held in this cache
